properties.value: Giant lobsters are encountered during the Slug Menace quest in Witchaven Dungeon. They are aggressive to all players, even to those more than twice their combat level. After the quest is complete, they can no longer be found in the dungeon.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Giant lobster
This article is about lobsters encountered in quests such as Slug Menace. For the lobster fought in Ghosts Ahoy, see Giant lobster (Ghosts Ahoy).

NPC ID4799

Giant lobsters are encountered during the Slug Menace quest in Witchaven Dungeon. They are aggressive to all players, even to those more than twice their combat level. After the quest is complete, they can no longer be found in the dungeon.

Giant lobsters which cannot be fought are also seen on the Fishing Platform.
